name: Where are my pets
description:
You are Lumberjack leaving in the middle of a big forest with his adorable pets. Pets are cute, but they often run away from the pen, it will be nice to finally fix this pen!

The aim of the WhereAreMyPets game is to find animals, which fled, and bring them back home. You must find them in the big forest by cutting with your ax a lot, really a lot! of trees.

The gameplay with each level getting faster and the map is growing. How fast you can go?

WhereAreMyPets is an offline 3D action game with a colorful, eyecatching graphic design and with positive, happy music. The aim of the game is to have fun and enjoy, without competition with opponents or time. It's really simple to play and at the same time very satisfying and addictive. Anyone can play this game!

Download the game today and help adorable animals, who are waiting for you!

On itch.io there is only available android version! for ios version go to app store.
